thread.title: 1MDB Nears Deadline for Sale of Power Assets
thread.title_full: 1MDB Nears Deadline for Sale of Power Assets - WSJ

author: P.R. Venkat
title: 1MDB Nears Deadline for Sale of Power Assets
text:
With final bids for power plants owned by Malaysiaâ€™s state-investment fund due Friday, few potential buyers remain, including government-owned power producers in Malaysia and Qatar, people familiar with the matter said.
The sale is crucial for 1 Malaysia Development Bhd., as it tries to dig out of its $11 billion debt hole. The fund paid roughly 12 billion ringgit ($2.85 billion) for the plants in 2012, and had valued them around $4...
